wiki.summary: “Falling Down” is an alternate version of the song “Sunlight On Your Skin” by Lil Peep and iLoveMakonnen. This version instead features XXXTENTACION and was made after Lil Peep’s death. The song was released by the label, Columbia Records. Fish Narc, a producer and friend of Peep from GOTHBOICLIQUE, opposed all efforts to release the song. He claimed that Peep was not supporting X due to the allegations against him, and suggested that Columbia Records was merely using Peep for financial gain. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: “Falling Down” is an alternate version of the song “Sunlight On Your Skin” by Lil Peep and iLoveMakonnen. This version instead features XXXTENTACION and was made after Lil Peep’s death. The song was released by the label, Columbia Records. Fish Narc, a producer and friend of Peep from GOTHBOICLIQUE, opposed all efforts to release the song. He claimed that Peep was not supporting X due to the allegations against him, and suggested that Columbia Records was merely using Peep for financial gain. Smokeasac confirmed the song’s release on his Instagram saying that “a very special song is dropping by my best friend @lilpeep called “falling down” featuring @xxxtentacion” Once the new version of the song was confirmed, many of Lil Peep’s close friends, family members, and collaborators were outraged by the songs new feature. Lil Peep’s mother stated in a comment replying to a fan that it wasn’t her choice X got put onto the song, it was iLoveMakonnen’s choice. iLoveMakonnen, who was featured on the original version of the song, said on his Instagram that he was “honored to have co-written this song that X was inspired to be a part of, shortly before he died”. XXXTENTACION's mother hinted at the song's release the day before and announced that she and Peep's mother teamed up for the release. Read more on Last.fm.
